title: 1. IRRI Agronomy Challenge: Setting the Stage on How to Grow a Productive Rice Crop

tasks.task: Learn how to grow a crop of rice.
subtasks: Find a suitable location for growing rice.
Acquire knowledge about best management practices for rice cultivation.
Participate in rice farming activities together.
Admit potential mistakes and challenges during the farming process.
Set a high yield target (7 tons per hectare) for the rice crop.
